name: Asteroid Deluge
description:
MOUSE ONLY

Game made for the Mini Jam 104.

Theme: Cascade

Limitation: Finite Quantity

Reach your home planet before it gets too far away!

Music by Marrow: https://twitter.com/_M4RR0W_

Additional sound effects from https://www.zapsplat.com

Color palette used : https://lospec.com/palette-list/mega-drive-blue
